metadata.title: CVE-2024-26735 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:sr: fix possible use-after-free and null-ptr-deref The pernet operationsstructure for the subsystem must be registered before registering thegeneric netlink family.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-225.237~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-225.237~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.15.0-225.237~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1168.181~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.15.0-1177.192~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.15.0-1162.179~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1131.142~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-225.237~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1168.181~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1177.192~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1162.179~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1131.142~16.04.1').
